article_title: FDA Cites Risks to Frying Potatoes Too Much
article_text:
The Food and Drug Administration says consumers should avoid frying, baking or roasting plant-based foods such as potatoes to a very dark brown, citing possible risk from a chemical linked in high doses to cancer in animals.

The agency also is recommending related steps for food makers when cooking foods like French fries.

At issue is...
